job_description:
Responsibilities: We Are Hiring ‚Äì Senior Executive Consultant

üìç Location: Rose Valley, Flat # A-1, House # 11, Road # 04, North Khulshi, Chattogram ‚Äì 4202
üí∞ Salary: Will increase based on skills, experience & eligibility
üïí Working Hours: 11:00 AM ‚Äì 6:00 PM

Requirements:
- Must be a graduate (Master‚Äôs degree preferred)
- 3-5 years of proven experience in marketing or education/migration consultancy
- Strong client handling skills
- Ability to meet monthly targets (mandatory)
- Ability to submit daily work reports
- Updated knowledge of emigration laws

Key Responsibilities:
- Consult with clients and provide tailored migration/education solutions
- Maintain strong client relationships and ensure client satisfaction
- Achieve monthly marketing and conversion targets
- Submit daily activity reports to management
- Generate innovative marketing ideas (both traditional and digital)
- Provide guidance to junior consultants
- Lead, motivate, and manage the team to achieve targets
- Take overall responsibility for team performance

Desired Qualities:
- Target-driven and highly responsible
- Strong leadership and team management skills
- Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
- Friendly, talkative, and client-focused personality
- Sociable and outgoing attitude
- Creative thinker with strong marketing sense
- Ability to adapt quickly to client needs

üëâ Send your CV to:
üìß rakib.dssmc@gmail.com

Responsibilities: Under the supervision of registered and licensed institutions, several assistant supervisors will be hired to ensure the security and monitoring of domestic and foreign Chinese and Indian projects, mills, industries, factories, houses, showrooms, and bank ATM booths.

Requirements: No security or experience required here. Other benefits: Free accommodation. Bonus salary given by the 10th of each month. Adequate overtime facilities available. Free medical treatment, bonus for 2 festivals per year. Attendance bonus equal to one day's attendance. Salary will increase in the first 6 months and annually thereafter. Those interested in working should contact the office directly or via WhatsApp. Contact: 01765227664 Yatrabari Kajla Bridge.

Responsibilities: About the job Details
Post Name: Customer Care Service Executive (Female)
Only Experienced People Apply Please, Minimum 2-3 Years Customer Care Service Executive, Telemarketing Executive. Only apply if you have worked as a Customer Care Service Executive or Telemarketing Executive. Candidates who have worked in marriage media will receive extra priority and better offers. Thank You
Educational Qualification: Minimum HSC, BA, BSC, BBA, MBA, BDS, CSE, EEE, ETE, ETCE, BBA. Complete
Experience:
* Educational qualification is relaxable in case of experienced candidates
* Preference will be given to candidates working in call center
* Must have basic computer knowledge. MS Word, Email Send, Email Check. WhatsApp use on Computer
Job Description:
1) On-call customer support, sending documents via WhatsApp
2) Receiving calls from clients and providing information
Opportunities:
2) Monthly mobile bill (as per company rules)
3) Annual salary increase (as per company rules)
4) Provision of commission for additional work
5) Arrangement of midday lunch in the office (Meal System)
6) Training and Promotion
Candidate Qualification and Documents:
- One copy of resume (biodata)
- One copy of recent full-size photograph (taken on mobile)
- Photocopy of school certificate
- Photocopy of national identity card
Salary: 12 to 24k Negotiable. Discussion based on qualifications
Office: DOHS Mohakhali, Customer Care Service Officer, Dhaka Telesales, Customer Care Service Executive, Marketing Executive, Office Executive, Call Center

Responsibilities: Business: Falaq Food is a food supplier company in Bangladesh. Falaq Food is working to ensure that safe food reaches every home at a fair price. Ensuring the best quality at a low price is the main challenge of Falaq Food. Falaq Food is on the path of honey, nuts, natural oils, chia seeds, and food grains. You can also get any product from Falaq Food from our official Facebook page (Facebook: Falaq Food). Or you can order any product by calling our Hotline Number: +8809613821489 directly. Website: https://falaqfood.com Responsibilities & Context Contacting new and existing customers via SIP/CRM Providing product and service information to engage potential customers. Closing sales and maintaining sales-related records. Answering customer queries and resolving any issues they may have. Preparing daily work reports and sharing them with the supervisor.

Requirements: Education: HSC or a Bachelor's degree. Experience: At least 1 year The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Telecommunication, Call Center Freshers are also encouraged to apply. Additional Requirements: Age 20 to 30 years Freshers are also encouraged to apply.
